snippet: Chicago tied the game with a bases-loaded walk and won on wild pitch to take three straight from Miami....
abstract: Chicago Cubs defeat Miami Marlins, 5-4; other MLB news noted.
lead_paragraph: Chicago tied the game with a bases-loaded walk and won on wild pitch to take three straight from Miami.

headline.print_headline: Cubs Complete Sweep With Three-Run Rally in the Ninth
headline.main: Cubs Complete Sweep With Three-Run Rally in the Ninth
